title: Entity Timeline
description: Per-entity history array stored in timeline/{entity_id}.json. Each entry captures the full entity state at a given patch version. Used for full card page stat comparison.

version.description: Semantic version of the patch this snapshot was taken from.

date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the patch was published.

snapshot.description: Full entity state at this version. Shape varies by entity type (hero, unit, spell, etc.).
